name: Twitch Plays Connect 4
description:
Welcome to Twitch Plays Connect 4! Included in the .jar is a standard game of Connect 4 that you can play locally with 2 players and, as the name implies, a specially designed version of the game meant for twitch. The latter faces off a streamer against their chat with the most voted number in the chat being picked as the chat's move. To play this new take on Connect 4 simply go to settings and fill out all the fields. To ensure you entered all information correctly, you can click "Test Bot Connection". If the connection is successful you're all set to play Connect 4 with your chat!
